title: Network Warning You have disconnected
body:
i was about to play a game when that message popped up and there was black screen...
i got leave buster..................
what the ****

replies.body:
Had the exact same thing happen to me just now, no idea why it happened. Tried reconnecting and such, turning off league client then logging back in and reconnecting and it didn't work. Has never happened to me before :( I updated Adobe Flash Player just before, which might be the cause but I can't confirm.
Hopefully it doesn't happen again now and I get a ban...
I am having the same problem... did you find a fix? I have a bad feeling it's from the new patch :(

Same issue.  New install of windows, too.

Are you still have this issue?  It sounds like something is blocking you from reaching the game server, which can result in the black screen because no assets can be downloaded.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if the issue persists to get that fixed up.  Let me know if it helps!

I'm still running into this issue. The game was running fine yesterday, today, not so much. I think I've tried to play 4 games today, and of those 4 games, so far, I've been able to play the last minute of one of them - I can't even begin to describe how great it was to spawn as a level 2 ezreal, while all my teammates and the bots (because i tried to test a game where only 5 people need to be in it and the practice tool worked fine) were level 10-12. You guys I think I made it to the nexus on my side before the game ended. Seriously, that may have been the best game of league I've played yet. (sarcasm) Anyway, I'm a little bummed about this crap, anyone find a fix for it yet? I'm pretty sure I shouldn't have to reinstall league more than once a year....
same issue.......terrible really. how long does it take to fix a small problem
Tired of this issue, had it since 7.11..... {{champion:17}}

I have this issue as well. Tried to do my first provisional and sadly I got the same black screen and warning. Everything else works perfectly on my laptop and it's definitely not an issue with the internet as I'm capable of browsing and streaming.

Edit: It's kind of unpleasant that I have to start the season with a remake/loss despite just trying to play the game. I'm glad the remake system is put into place so my teammates do not have to suffer a 4v5. However, it's very off putting and dissatisfying. In all honesty it has negatively impacted my experience with the game. 

Additionally, I wasn't the only one who had a client crash in the game.
It seems to be intermittent.  All other internet-reliant things are running fine as well.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/E9XXwqX0-you-have-been-disconnected-please-check-your-internet-and-enjoy-leaverbuster-trololololo

Sorry Riot, I just made that thread before I saw this post
Having the same issue. Everything else working absolutely fine. My friend was in the same game and said they couldn't remake because I "joined". Yet in no way can I get in.
When l play  the game in the game says  disconnected but my computer is connecting.help me .thanks
